name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: kShare - Share URL to QR Code & Social Media

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily Share browser URL to QR Code, Copy & Share to Social Media

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
kShare simplifies the process of sharing links directly from your Chrome browser's address bar. It offers convenient options to generate a QR code, copy the URL, share on social media, and more. This enables you to enjoy similar functionalities as the built-in Google Chrome option for sharing browser links.

- Easily copy the browser URL.
- Convert the URL to a QR Code effortlessly.
- Send the URL via email with ease.
- Share the link on WhatsApp effortlessly.
- Share the URL on Facebook without hassle.
- Share the URL on Pinterest with simplicity.
- Share the URL on Twitter(x.com) effortlessly.
- Save the browser URL for later use, maintaining a history of visited URLs that can be downloaded later.

kShare is a user-friendly tool designed for the convenient sharing of browser links, tailored for Google Chrome.
